an3.10:4.1: “Tīhi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato tayo male appahāya yathābhataṃ nikkhitto evaṃ niraye.
an3.10:4.3: Dussīlo ca hoti, dussīlyamalañcassa appahīnaṃ hoti;
an3.10:4.4: issukī ca hoti, issāmalañcassa appahīnaṃ hoti;
an3.10:4.5: maccharī ca hoti, maccheramalañcassa appahīnaṃ hoti.
an3.10:4.6: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, tīhi dhammehi samannāgato ime tayo male appahāya yathābhataṃ nikkhitto evaṃ niraye.
an3.10:5.1: Tīhi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato tayo male pahāya yathābhataṃ nikkhitto evaṃ sagge.
an3.10:5.3: Sīlavā ca hoti, dussīlyamalañcassa pahīnaṃ hoti;
an3.10:5.4: anissukī ca hoti, issāmalañcassa pahīnaṃ hoti;
an3.10:5.5: amaccharī ca hoti, maccheramalañcassa pahīnaṃ hoti.
an3.10:5.6: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, tīhi dhammehi samannāgato ime tayo male pahāya yathābhataṃ nikkhitto evaṃ sagge”ti.
